name: coding-platform-microservices
description: Code Playground Platform with Microservices Architecture

scripts.services: concurrently "npm run gateway" "npm run auth" "npm run user" "npm run workspace" "npm run snippet" "npm run apitest" "npm run terminal" "npm run admin"
